movies.title: Vampire Boys
movies.plot: Jasin and his vampire brood's time is running out. In order for them to survive, Jasin needs to find a mortal to turn into a vampire to spend eternity with. Los Angeles provides plenty of young candidates. The brood has their eyes set on Tara, a young, gorgeous blond college student. Tara is open to the idea of becoming a vampire, but someone else enters the picture to disrupt the brood's plans. Caleb, a fresh face college student new to Los Angeles, keeps dreaming of a mysterious stranger. At school, Caleb meets the stranger, Jasin, and they have an instant connection. The problem is that time is short, and Jasin needs to convince Caleb that eternity as a vampire can be a very sweet life.
movies.simplePlot: Jasin and his vampire brood's time is running out. In order for them to survive, Jasin needs to find a mortal to turn into a vampire to spend eternity with. Los Angeles provides plenty of ...

biography.bio: Jason Lockhart is a successful Writer/Director, having sold 2 feature films and was fortunate enough to win Best Director awards for each of them at established film festivals. His mockumentary with sex drive, Casting Couch (2013), earned him Best Director and Best Writer at the 7th Annual Mockfest of Hollywood, then hit The CW as a "Movie of the Week." The film has also gone on to see major airplay on Fox, ABC and Netflix. Jason's second feature, the veteran star-studded comedy/horror, Silent But Deadly (2012), earned him Best Director at the Hoboken International Film Festival and released to rave reviews for being quirky, fun, original and entertaining. Having grown up a "child actor" in the industry, Jason has since earned his degree in theatre, done over 60 plays across the country and worked on numerous national commercials and indie films, ranging from the original "Click-It or Ticket Kid," to starring in the cult hit Vampire Boys (2011). It was his passions for business and storytelling that ultimately launched a writing career and quickly led him behind the camera. While living in Los Angeles, Jason also founded Webisoap.com (a former residence for cheesy soap series) and Quirkfest, an LA Comedy Film Festival. In 2013, Jason worked as an Executive Producer on National Lampoon's Another Dirty Movie (2012), and in 2014 he moved to Beverly Hills with his gorgeous wiener dog, Mo.
biography.name: Jason Lockhart

biography.bio: Christian Ferrer is known for his work on Vampire Boys (2011), Eating Out: The Open Weekend (2011) and A Broken Code (2012).
biography.name: Christian Ferrer

biography.bio: Dylan Vox was born on December 25, 1974 in Atlanta, Georgia, USA. He is an actor and producer, known for Hercules Reborn (2014), Jersey Shore Shark Attack (2012) and Dead 7 (2016).
biography.name: Dylan Vox

biography.bio: Jess Allen was born as Jess Allen Sari. He is an actor, known for Broken Glass (2013), A Big Love Story (2012) and Die Fighting (2014).
biography.name: Jess Allen

biography.bio: Tanner Acord is an actor, known for Vampire Boys (2011) and Beach Heat Miami (2010).
biography.name: Tanner Acord

biography.bio: Ryan Adames is an actor, known for Eating Out: The Open Weekend (2011), Eating Out: All You Can Eat (2009) and Vampire Boys (2011).
biography.name: Ryan Adames

biography.bio: Zasu is an actress, known for Vampire Boys 2: The New Brood (2013), Vampire Boys (2011) and CSI: Miami (2002).
biography.name: Zasu

biography.bio: Greg McKeon is an actor and writer, known for Eating Out: All You Can Eat (2009), Eating Out: The Open Weekend (2011) and Vampire Boys (2011).
biography.name: Greg McKeon

biography.bio: Walter Delmar was born in Sacramento. Walter attended a private school and played every sport until his first acting class. At that point, at 9, nothing else existed. After High School, he moved to London for 6 months to gain insight. After London he moved to San Francisco and achieved a Bachelors Degree in Theater Arts & Holistic Health from San Francisco State University. His favorite part of college was portraying "Louis" in Tony Kushner's play Angels in America. After college, Walter moved to Hollywood to achieve his dream of being a working actor, writer, and producer. So far...
biography.name: Walter Delmar

biography.bio: Marlene Mc'Cohen was born in Oldham, England as Marlene Nikkaran Barforough. She is an actress and producer, known for It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia (2005), The Last Night Inn (2016) and Interstellar Wars (2016).
biography.name: Marlene Mc'Cohen

biography.bio: Michael Shoel is a producer and actor, known for Eating Out 2: Sloppy Seconds (2006), Eating Out: All You Can Eat (2009) and Eating Out (2004).
biography.name: Michael Shoel

biography.bio: Creep Creepersin was born on March 13, 1978 in Anaheim, California, USA as Matthew Thorin Wall. He is a producer and director, known for Another Superhero Movie (2011), Orgy of the Damned (2010) and Theatre of the Deranged (2012). He has been married to Nikki Wall since March 29, 2008. They have two children.
biography.name: Creep Creepersin

biography.bio: Buz Wallick is an independent producer in Los Angeles, California. Buz Wallick was born and raised in Northern California where he cultivated a love and fascination with cinema. Buz has the unique background of being self taught and working on the crew of over 100 projects, including Cinematographer of the award winning documentary Never Sleep Again: The Elm Street Legacy . In 2012 Buz began to produce and with his extensive knowledge of film production Buz does what he loves to do; tell stories through the art of cinema.
biography.name: Buz Wallick

biography.bio: Shana Eva is an actress and writer, known for Lost in Time (2015), Angela vs Bath & Body Works Rant (2014) and Miss Americups: The True Story Behind the 2015 Miss America Pageant (2014).
biography.name: Shana Eva

biography.bio: Jennifer Hanley is an actress and producer, known for Inferno (2016), Decay (2015) and Frost/Nixon (2008).
biography.name: Jennifer Hanley
